title: Fashionably late: Saudi Arabia hosts its first fashion week
text:
Fashionably late: Saudi Arabia hosts its first fashion week 7:12pm IST - 02:29 
Saudi Arabia's first-ever fashion week has kicked off in the capital Riyadh as social restrictions ease in the ultra-conservative kingdom. Reuters' Emily Wither reports from the capital. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
